title: 4mm Panel Mount Banana Socket - Black
blurb:
Designed to take the insulated banana plugs, these panel mount sockets only project 2mm above the mounting surface. Also fully insulated.
Mounting hole: 12mm
Rated for 10A at 250VAC
Red: PS-0420
Black: PS-0421
Green: PS-0422
Blue: PS-0423
Yellow: PS-0424
